sourceDesc.p: Retrieved from Grabber Zone (https://grabber.zone/comics/sonic-idw/2018-2019-neo-metal-sonic-saga/sonic-the-hedgehog-01/), an online Sonic comic collection gathered for educational purposes

p.note: A value of 'NNC' for the cbml:panel element's 'characters' attribute is an acronym standing for No Named Characters, meaning no characters with names appeared in the panel.
A '(?)' within a note with a type value of 'panelDesc' means that the encoding author saw something unidentifiable, or else is unsure of their own identification.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Sonic the Hedgehog has spent years fighting the forces of Dr. Eggman.
cbml:panel.note: Within the Final Egg, Sonic faces off with the Egg Viper, an enormous serpentine robot piloted by Dr. Eggman.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Time and time again, the mad doctor attacks, Sonic strikes back, then relaxes until Eggman returns.
cbml:panel.note: Atop the Final Forretress, Sonic battles the Egg Emperor, a humanoide mecha equipped with a lance and shield.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But after their last battle...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic stares down the Egg Dragoon, a flying robot with laser wings and an imposing gatling gun arm.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...Dr. Eggman vanished...
cbml:panel.note: Against an overcast sky, Sonic fights the Death Egg Robot, a bulbous robot with a single glassy eye-like fixture and numerous tentacle appendages.
Within the gutters of the page's other panels, Sonic is framed from the front, running forward with a determined look on his face.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ...But his robot army did not!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic is jogging down a path. In the distance, a walled-in city can be seen with smoke rising in the air and numerous missiles being fired haphazardly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sounds like the locals are putting up a fight. I hope they don't mind me lending a hand!
cbml:panel.note: Placing one hand on the ground, Sonic starts running in place, his legs becoming a red blur.
Sonic speeds into the distance, leaving an elongated dust cloud behind him. It's clear that the doors of the city have been blown wide open.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Run! Get to the storm bunker!
cbml:panel.note: A town resident holding a Cube Wispon distressedly directs other unarmed residents away from approaching robots.
The resident brandishes his weapon, shaking in fear. An Egg Pawn looms closer.
The Egg Pawn knocks the Cube Wispon out of the resident's hands.
Numerous Egg Pawns approach the fallen resident, who cowers on the ground.
Sonic appears as a blue blurring ball, bouncing between each of the Egg Pawns and smashing them to pieces.
Sonic extends a hand to the resident, picking up the Cube Wispon too.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The one and only. Here you go. Try swinging it at the robots next time. I knew somebody who put it to good use.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic hands the Wispon back to the resident, who stands nervously.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Maybe get inside, buddy. Nice chat! Need to save your town. Bye!
cbml:panel.note: The resident watches as Sonic dashes around a corner.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sweet! The town militia! Bots coming in from the north! You've got a guy holding his own out there!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic dashes past three armed animals, a cat, a dog (?) and a rabbit, who appear worried.
A blue bird strugles to open a hatch on the ground while a red fox (?) panics, watching a line of Motobugs drive closer.
Sonic runs through the Motobugs, knocking them all aside.
As he skids to a stop, Sonic strikes a pose, winking and flashing two finger guns. The residents stand in awe.
Sonic dashes off the right side of the panel, throwing up dirt behind him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...All this terror might be worth it if I get to say Sonic winked at me!
I hope we survive long enough to get his autograph!
cbml:panel.note: The residents, much calmer now, are very impressed by Sonic.
An enormous hammerhead slams into the ground right in front of Sonic, as he screeches to a stop, looking disappointed.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh hey, another hammer-guy. I liked the earlier one better.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic stands in front of an Egg Hammer, an imposing robot the size of a building, with a hammer just as tall.
Sonic spin dashes into the Egg Hammer multiple times, forcing him to step back. More Egg Hammers lurk behind the corner.
Jumping off of a window ledge, Sonic launches himself at the Egg Hammer, who begins to raise his hammer.
